-1045183535.name: WEAPON_REVOLVER
-1045183535.localizedDescription: A handgun with enough stopping power to drop a crazed rhino, and heavy enough to beat it to death if you're out of ammo. Part of Executives and Other Criminals.

-538741184.name: WEAPON_SWITCHBLADE
-538741184.localizedDescription: From your pocket to hilt-deep in the other guy's ribs in under a second: folding knives will never go out of style. Part of Executives and Other Criminals.

317205821.name: WEAPON_AUTOSHOTGUN
317205821.localizedDescription: How many effective tools for riot control can you tuck into your pants? OK, two. But this is the other one. Part of Bikers.

-853065399.name: WEAPON_BATTLEAXE
-853065399.localizedDescription: If it's good enough for medieval foot soldiers, modern border guards and pushy soccer moms, it's good enough for you. Part of Bikers.

125959754.name: WEAPON_COMPACTLAUNCHER
125959754.localizedDescription: Focus groups using the regular model suggested it was too accurate and found it awkward to use with one hand on the throttle. Easy fix. Part of Bikers.

-1121678507.name: WEAPON_MINISMG
-1121678507.localizedDescription: Increasingly popular since the marketing team looked beyond spec ops units and started caring about the little guys in low income areas. Part of Bikers.

-1169823560.name: WEAPON_PIPEBOMB
-1169823560.localizedDescription: Remember, it doesn't count as an IED when you buy it in a store and use it in a first world country. Part of Bikers.

-1810795771.name: WEAPON_POOLCUE
-1810795771.localizedDescription: Ah, there's no sound as satisfying as the crack of a perfect break, especially when it's the other guy's spine. Part of Bikers.

419712736.name: WEAPON_WRENCH
419712736.localizedDescription: Perennial favourite of apocalyptic survivalists and violent fathers the world over, apparently it also doubles as some kind of tool. Part of Bikers.

-1420407917.name: WEAPON_PROXMINE
-1420407917.localizedDescription: Leave a present for your friends with these motion sensor landmines. Short delay after activation. Part of the Festive Surprise.

1672152130.name: WEAPON_HOMINGLAUNCHER
1672152130.localizedDescription: Infrared guided fire-and-forget missile launcher. For all your moving target needs. Part of the Festive Surprise.

-1075685676.name: WEAPON_PISTOL_MK2
-1075685676.localizedDescription: Balance, simplicity, precision: nothing keeps the peace like an extended barrel in the other guy's mouth.

634039983.name: COMPONENT_PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_TRACER
634039983.localizedDescription: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

733837882.name: COMPONENT_PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
733837882.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

2248057097.name: COMPONENT_PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT
2248057097.localizedDescription: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

1329061674.name: COMPONENT_PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
1329061674.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

2024373456.name: WEAPON_SMG_MK2
2024373456.localizedDescription: Lightweight, compact, with a rate of fire to die very messily for: turn any confined space into a kill box at the click of a well-oiled trigger.

2146055916.name: COMPONENT_SMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER
2146055916.localizedDescription: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

3650233061.name: COMPONENT_SMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
3650233061.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

974903034.name: COMPONENT_SMG_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT
974903034.localizedDescription: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

190476639.name: COMPONENT_SMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
190476639.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

2681951826.name: COMPONENT_AT_SIGHTS_SMG
2681951826.localizedDescription: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

2774849419.name: COMPONENT_AT_SB_BARREL_02
2774849419.localizedDescription: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

961495388.name: WEAPON_ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2
961495388.localizedDescription: The definitive revision of an all-time classic: all it takes is a little work, and looks can kill after all.

4012669121.name: COMPONENT_ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER
4012669121.localizedDescription: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

4218476627.name: COMPONENT_ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
4218476627.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

2816286296.name: COMPONENT_ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING
2816286296.localizedDescription: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

1675665560.name: COMPONENT_ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
1675665560.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

1108334355.name: COMPONENT_AT_SIGHTS
1108334355.localizedDescription: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

1447477866.name: COMPONENT_AT_AR_BARREL_02
1447477866.localizedDescription: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

-86904375.name: WEAPON_CARBINERIFLE_MK2
-86904375.localizedDescription: This is bespoke, artisan firepower: you couldn't deliver a hail of bullets with more love and care if you inserted them by hand.

391640422.name: COMPONENT_CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER
391640422.localizedDescription: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

1025884839.name: COMPONENT_CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
1025884839.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

626875735.name: COMPONENT_CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING
626875735.localizedDescription: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

1141059345.name: COMPONENT_CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
1141059345.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

1108334355.name: COMPONENT_AT_SIGHTS
1108334355.localizedDescription: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

2335983627.name: COMPONENT_AT_CR_BARREL_02
2335983627.localizedDescription: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

-608341376.name: WEAPON_COMBATMG_MK2
-608341376.localizedDescription: You can never have too much of a good thing: after all, if the first shot counts, then the next hundred or so must count for double.

4133787461.name: COMPONENT_COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER
4133787461.localizedDescription: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

3274096058.name: COMPONENT_COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
3274096058.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

696788003.name: COMPONENT_COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING
696788003.localizedDescription: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

1475288264.name: COMPONENT_COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
1475288264.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

1108334355.name: COMPONENT_AT_SIGHTS
1108334355.localizedDescription: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

3051509595.name: COMPONENT_AT_MG_BARREL_02
3051509595.localizedDescription: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

177293209.name: WEAPON_HEAVYSNIPER_MK2
177293209.localizedDescription: Far away, yet always intimate: if you're looking for a secure foundation for that long-distance relationship, this is it.

247526935.name: COMPONENT_HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY
247526935.localizedDescription: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

4164277972.name: COMPONENT_HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING
4164277972.localizedDescription: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

1005144310.name: COMPONENT_HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_FMJ
1005144310.localizedDescription: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

2313935527.name: COMPONENT_HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_EXPLOSIVE
2313935527.localizedDescription: Bullets which explode on impact. Reduced capacity.

3061846192.name: COMPONENT_AT_SCOPE_NV
3061846192.localizedDescription: Long-range zoom with toggleable night vision.

776198721.name: COMPONENT_AT_SCOPE_THERMAL
776198721.localizedDescription: Long-range zoom with toggleable thermal vision.

277524638.name: COMPONENT_AT_SR_BARREL_02
277524638.localizedDescription: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

-1951375401.name: WEAPON_FLASHLIGHT
-1951375401.localizedDescription: Intensify your fear of the dark with this short range, battery-powered light source. Handy for blunt force trauma. Part of The Halloween Surprise.

1198879012.name: WEAPON_FLAREGUN
1198879012.localizedDescription: Use to signal distress or drunken excitement. Warning: pointing directly at individuals may cause spontaneous combustion. Part of The Heists Update.

-581044007.name: WEAPON_MACHETE
-581044007.localizedDescription: America's West African arms trade isn't just about giving. Rediscover the simple life with this rusty cleaver. Part of Lowriders.

-619010992.name: WEAPON_MACHINEPISTOL
-619010992.localizedDescription: This fully automatic is the snare drum to your twin-engine V8 bass: no drive-by sounds quite right without it. Part of Lowriders.

-275439685.name: WEAPON_DBSHOTGUN
-275439685.localizedDescription: Do one thing, do it well. Who needs a high rate of fire when your first shot turns the other guy into a fine mist? Part of Lowriders: Custom Classics.

1649403952.name: WEAPON_COMPACTRIFLE
1649403952.localizedDescription: Half the size, all the power, double the recoil: there's no riskier way to say "I'm compensating for something". Part of Lowriders: Custom Classics.

171789620.name: WEAPON_COMBATPDW
171789620.localizedDescription: Who said personal weaponry couldn't be worthy of military personnel? Thanks to our lobbyists, not Congress. Integral suppressor. Part of the Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 1.

-656458692.name: WEAPON_KNUCKLE
-656458692.localizedDescription: Perfect for knocking out gold teeth, or as a gift to the trophy partner who has everything. Part of The Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 2.

-598887786.name: WEAPON_MARKSMANPISTOL
-598887786.localizedDescription: Not for the risk averse. Make it count as you'll be reloading as much as you shoot. Part of The Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 2.

-102323637.name: WEAPON_BOTTLE
-102323637.localizedDescription: It's not clever and it's not pretty but, most of the time, neither is the guy coming at you with a knife. When all else fails, this gets the job done. Part of the Beach Bum Pack.

-1076751822.name: WEAPON_SNSPISTOL
-1076751822.localizedDescription: Like condoms or hairspray, this fits in your pocket for a night out in a Vinewood club. It's half as accurate as a champagne cork but twice as deadly. Part of the Beach Bum Pack.

-771403250.name: WEAPON_HEAVYPISTOL
-771403250.localizedDescription: The heavyweight champion of the magazine fed, semi-automatic handgun world. Delivers a serious forearm workout every time. Part of The Business Update.

-1063057011.name: WEAPON_SPECIALCARBINE
-1063057011.localizedDescription: Combining accuracy, maneuverability and low recoil, this is an extremely versatile assault rifle for any combat situation. Part of The Business Update.

2132975508.name: WEAPON_BULLPUPRIFLE
2132975508.localizedDescription: The latest Chinese import taking America by storm, this rifle is known for its balanced handling. Lightweight and very controllable in automatic fire. Part of The High Life Update.

-1834847097.name: WEAPON_DAGGER
-1834847097.localizedDescription: You've been rocking the pirate-chic look for a while, but no vicious weapon to complete the look? Get this dagger with guarded hilt. Part of The "I'm Not a Hipster" Update.

137902532.name: WEAPON_VINTAGEPISTOL
137902532.localizedDescription: What you really need is a more recognizable gun. Stand out from the crowd at an armed robbery with this engraved pistol. Part of The "I'm Not a Hipster" Update.

2138347493.name: WEAPON_FIREWORK
2138347493.localizedDescription: Put the flair back in flare with this firework launcher, guaranteed to raise some oohs and aahs from the crowd. Part of the Independence Day Special.

-1466123874.name: WEAPON_MUSKET
-1466123874.localizedDescription: Armed with nothing but muskets and a superiority complex, the Brits took over half the world. Own the gun that built an empire. Part of the Independence Day Special.

984333226.name: WEAPON_HEAVYSHOTGUN
984333226.localizedDescription: The weapon to reach for when you absolutely need to make a horrible mess of the room. Best used near easy-wipe surfaces only. Part of the Last Team Standing Update.

-952879014.name: WEAPON_MARKSMANRIFLE
-952879014.localizedDescription: Whether you're up close or a disconcertingly long way away, this weapon will get the job done. A multi-range tool for tools. Part of the Last Team Standing Update.

1627465347.name: WEAPON_GUSENBERG
1627465347.localizedDescription: Complete your look with a Prohibition gun. Looks great being fired from an Albany Roosevelt or paired with a pinstripe suit. Part of the Valentine's Day Massacre Special.

-102973651.name: WEAPON_HATCHET
-102973651.localizedDescription: Make kindling... of your pals with this easy to wield, easy to hide hatchet. Exclusive content for returning players.

1834241177.name: WEAPON_RAILGUN
1834241177.localizedDescription: All you need to know is - magnets, and it does horrible things to the things it's pointed at. Exclusive content for returning players.

-1716189206.name: WEAPON_KNIFE
-1716189206.localizedDescription: This carbon steel 7" bladed knife is dual edged with a serrated spine to provide improved stabbing and thrusting capabilities.

1317494643.name: WEAPON_HAMMER
1317494643.localizedDescription: A robust, multi-purpose hammer with wooden handle and curved claw, this old classic still nails the competition.

-1786099057.name: WEAPON_BAT
-1786099057.localizedDescription: Aluminum baseball bat with leather grip. Lightweight yet powerful for all you big hitters out there.

1141786504.name: WEAPON_GOLFCLUB
1141786504.localizedDescription: Standard length, mid iron golf club with rubber grip for a lethal short game.

-2067956739.name: WEAPON_CROWBAR
-2067956739.localizedDescription: Heavy-duty crowbar forged from high quality, tempered steel for that extra leverage you need to get the job done.

1593441988.name: WEAPON_COMBATPISTOL
1593441988.localizedDescription: A compact, lightweight, semi-automatic pistol designed for law enforcement and personal defense. 12-round magazine with option to extend to 16 rounds.

584646201.name: WEAPON_APPISTOL
584646201.localizedDescription: High-penetration, fully-automatic pistol. Holds 18 rounds in magazine with option to extend to 36 rounds.

-1716589765.name: WEAPON_PISTOL50
-1716589765.localizedDescription: High-impact pistol that delivers immense power but with extremely strong recoil. Holds 9 rounds in magazine.

324215364.name: WEAPON_MICROSMG
324215364.localizedDescription: Combines compact design with a high rate of fire at approximately 700-900 rounds per minute.

736523883.name: WEAPON_SMG
736523883.localizedDescription: This is known as a good all-round submachine gun. Lightweight with an accurate sight and 30-round magazine capacity.

-270015777.name: WEAPON_ASSAULTSMG
-270015777.localizedDescription: A high-capacity submachine gun that is both compact and lightweight. Holds up to 30 bullets in one magazine.

-1074790547.name: WEAPON_ASSAULTRIFLE
-1074790547.localizedDescription: This standard assault rifle boasts a large capacity magazine and long distance accuracy.

-2084633992.name: WEAPON_CARBINERIFLE
-2084633992.localizedDescription: Combining long distance accuracy with a high-capacity magazine, the carbine rifle can be relied on to make the hit.

-1357824103.name: WEAPON_ADVANCEDRIFLE
-1357824103.localizedDescription: The most lightweight and compact of all assault rifles, without compromising accuracy and rate of fire.

-1660422300.name: WEAPON_MG
-1660422300.localizedDescription: General purpose machine gun that combines rugged design with dependable performance. Long range penetrative power. Very effective against large groups.

2144741730.name: WEAPON_COMBATMG
2144741730.localizedDescription: Lightweight, compact machine gun that combines excellent maneuverability with a high rate of fire to devastating effect.

487013001.name: WEAPON_PUMPSHOTGUN
487013001.localizedDescription: Standard shotgun ideal for short-range combat. A high-projectile spread makes up for its lower accuracy at long range.

2017895192.name: WEAPON_SAWNOFFSHOTGUN
2017895192.localizedDescription: This single-barrel, sawed-off shotgun compensates for its low range and ammo capacity with devastating efficiency in close combat.

-494615257.name: WEAPON_ASSAULTSHOTGUN
-494615257.localizedDescription: Fully automatic shotgun with 8 round magazine and high rate of fire.

-1654528753.name: WEAPON_BULLPUPSHOTGUN
-1654528753.localizedDescription: More than makes up for its slow, pump-action rate of fire with its range and spread.  Decimates anything in its projectile path.

911657153.name: WEAPON_STUNGUN
911657153.localizedDescription: Fires a projectile that administers a voltage capable of temporarily stunning an assailant. Takes approximately 4 seconds to recharge after firing.

100416529.name: WEAPON_SNIPERRIFLE
100416529.localizedDescription: Standard sniper rifle. Ideal for situations that require accuracy at long range. Limitations include slow reload speed and very low rate of fire.

205991906.name: WEAPON_HEAVYSNIPER
205991906.localizedDescription: Features armor-piercing rounds for heavy damage. Comes with laser scope as standard.

-1568386805.name: WEAPON_GRENADELAUNCHER
-1568386805.localizedDescription: A compact, lightweight grenade launcher with semi-automatic functionality. Holds up to 10 rounds.

-1312131151.name: WEAPON_RPG
-1312131151.localizedDescription: A portable, shoulder-launched, anti-tank weapon that fires explosive warheads. Very effective for taking down vehicles or large groups of assailants.

1119849093.name: WEAPON_MINIGUN
1119849093.localizedDescription: A devastating 6-barrel machine gun that features Gatling-style rotating barrels. Very high rate of fire (2000 to 6000 rounds per minute).

-1813897027.name: WEAPON_GRENADE
-1813897027.localizedDescription: Standard fragmentation grenade. Pull pin, throw, then find cover. Ideal for eliminating clustered assailants.

741814745.name: WEAPON_STICKYBOMB
741814745.localizedDescription: A plastic explosive charge fitted with a remote detonator. Can be thrown and then detonated or attached to a vehicle then detonated.

-37975472.name: WEAPON_SMOKEGRENADE
-37975472.localizedDescription: Tear gas grenade, particularly effective at incapacitating multiple assailants. Sustained exposure can be lethal.

615608432.name: WEAPON_MOLOTOV
615608432.localizedDescription: Crude yet highly effective incendiary weapon. No happy hour with this cocktail.

883325847.name: WEAPON_PETROLCAN
883325847.localizedDescription: Leaves a trail of gasoline that can be ignited.

-72657034.name: GADGET_PARACHUTE
-72657034.localizedDescription: This nylon sports parachute features a ram-air parafoil design for increased control over direction and speed.
